body: Whenever you are the target of a divine spell, you can, as a swift action, grant each ally within 15 feet of you a divine boon. This boon grants a +2 bonus on the next attack roll, skill check, or ability check made before the end of their next turn. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
name: Divine Vessel
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Cleric/Subdomains/Divine Subdomain/Replacement Power/Divine Vessel
